products.name: Seasonal Salad
products.description: A delicious vegetable salad made with lettuce, arugula, tomato, cucumber, onion, corn, olives, and olive oil.

products.name: Tuna Salad
products.description: A light and healthy salad made with lettuce, tuna, cucumber, tomato, mustard, olive oil, and lemon juice.

products.name: Mediterranean Salad
products.description: A delicious Mediterranean salad made with lettuce, tomato, cucumber, red onion, olives, cheese, and olive oil.

products.name: Quinoa Salad
products.description: A healthy and filling salad made with quinoa, chicken, avocado, tomato, cucumber, bell pepper, and lemon juice.

products.name: Walnut Broccoli Salad
products.description: A delicious and nutritious salad made with broccoli, walnuts, red onion, raisins, and olive oil.
